description: Tarisa Manandal is a Nepalese Army Second Lieutenant participating in the XFJ Plan as a test pilot. Her ethnic background as a Ghurka is well known for its bravery and fighting spirit. This nature is also reflected in TSF piloting by a preference for melee combat. Prior to participating in Project PROMINENCE she carried out trials of the F-5G in the Andaman Islands.
name: Tarisa Manandal
